name: Ready, Steady, Grow!
description:
A little game where you and a friend team up in your allotment, armed with your trusty rake and watering can, with one aim: To Win the Pumpkin Competition!

To do this you must grow and sell your produce by planting the seeds from the seed bins into your patch. Clear out the weeds to make space for your pumpkin to grow and water your produce to keep it healthy. Watch out for the pests eating your crops! Once you get enough money, grow your patch by going to your shed, so that you can make space for an even bigger pumpkin and try to stand atop the pumpkin podium! 

Player 1 Controls

  • WASD (or Arrow Keys) to move
  • Left Click (or Ctrl) to interact (pick up tools, sell produce etc.)
  • Right Click (or Alt) to Drop held item

Player 2 Controls

  • Left Stcik to move
  • A (for Xbox Controller) to interact
  • B (for Xbox Controller) to Drop held item

All controls are reconfigurable thanks to Unity's input config!
